about.title: About Us
about.missionContent: Our purpose is to provide comprehensive services for lifting, mobilization and land transport of heavy and extra-heavy loads, a wide variety of updated and high-capacity cranes, mobile telescopic and crawler cranes from 25 tons to 1600 tons from German brands Grove, Liebherr and Manitowoc, and hydraulic super lowboys for handling exceptional loads such as electric generators, metro and railway cars, turbines and oil and industrial generators. By meeting criteria of safety, guarantee, reliability, responsibility and quality, in order to anticipate and respond effectively to the needs and requirements of our clients, relying on highly qualified personnel capable of achieving the highest performance in effective and fast solutions in all our services.
about.visionContent: To be a service company recognized, nationally and internationally, for its excellence in providing comprehensive lifting, mobilization and land transport services of heavy and extra-heavy loads in Venezuela, continuously improving effectiveness, thus developing the capacity to respond and achieve satisfaction of our clients' needs.
about.visionItem1: Provide Services with Safety and Quality under the highest standards
about.visionItem2: The client is and will always be the center of our attention
about.visionItem3: Our clients' business is our business
about.philosophyItem1: Give our clients the reliability to deliver
about.philosophyItem2: Be accurate and objective in all services provided
about.philosophyItem3: Contribute to the growth and development of Venezuela
about.philosophyItem5: You are an integral part of "EQUISER, C.A."
about.valuesItem2: Safety and Quality in our works and services
about.valuesItem3: Efficiency and Responsibility in our productive and administrative processes
about.valuesItem4: The Safety of our personnel and entrusted facilities
about.commitmentText: At EQUISER, each project is an opportunity to demonstrate our excellence and commitment to safety. With over 30 years of experience, we continue to be the leading company in lifting and heavy transport services in Venezuela, always focused on exceeding our clients' expectations.

faq.sectionDescription: We clarify the most common questions about our
faq.warningText: EQUISER DOES NOT provide tow truck services for light vehicles, roadside assistance, or residential projects. We specialize in
faq.q1Question: Does EQUISER tow cars or personal vehicles?
faq.q1Answer: NO. EQUISER specializes EXCLUSIVELY in large-scale industrial projects. Our mobile and crawler cranes have capacities from 25 to 1,600 tons, designed for oil & gas, petrochemical, energy, steel, port and heavy construction sectors. We DO NOT offer tow truck services for light vehicles.
faq.q2Question: What is the MINIMUM capacity of your cranes?
faq.q2Answer: Our smallest crane has a capacity of 25 tons, ideal for medium-sized industrial projects. For reference, this is equivalent to lifting approximately 35-40 compact vehicles simultaneously. We work exclusively with companies on infrastructure, oil, petrochemical, energy, steel and heavy manufacturing projects.
faq.q3Question: Do you serve residential or personal projects?
faq.q3Answer: NO. EQUISER is focused on the B2B industrial sector. We serve petrochemical companies (Pequiven, El Palito Refinery), oil companies, power plants, major infrastructure contractors, steel mills (SIDOR), ports and heavy manufacturing. Our services include transport of transformers, turbines, reactors, generators, major steel structures and large-tonnage industrial equipment.
faq.q4Question: What types of industrial projects do you perform?
faq.q4Answer: We perform highly complex projects: installation of electrical transformers (50-250 tons), mounting turbines in thermal plants, lifting petrochemical reactors, transport of industrial generators, mobilization of equipment for Pequiven and El Palito Refinery, steel projects in Ciudad Guayana, port operations for heavy cargo, and industrial assemblies in refineries. We have specific certifications for the Venezuelan oil and petrochemical sectors.
faq.q5Question: In which Venezuelan cities do you operate?
faq.q5Answer: We have nationwide coverage with operations base in Barcelona, Anzo√°tegui. We regularly operate in: Maracaibo (Zulia) - oil sector, Valencia and Puerto Cabello (Carabobo) - industrial/port/petrochemical, Orinoco Belt (Anzo√°tegui/Monagas) - oil sector projects, Puerto La Cruz - port operations, Ciudad Guayana (Bol√≠var) - steel sector, Jos√© Complex - refinery, Mor√≥n (Carabobo) - Pequiven and El Palito Refinery, Caracas and Miranda - energy projects, Matur√≠n (Monagas) - oil sector, and throughout the country according to project requirements.
faq.q6Question: What industrial sectors are your main clients?
faq.q6Answer: Our main clients are: OIL & GAS SECTOR (oil sector operating companies), PETROCHEMICAL (Pequiven, El Palito Refinery, Jos√© Complex), ENERGY (power plants, thermal generation), STEEL (SIDOR, steel manufacturing), PORT (ports of Puerto La Cruz, Puerto Cabello, La Guaira), INDUSTRIAL (heavy manufacturing, chemical plants), MAJOR CONSTRUCTION (infrastructure, bridges, viaducts), and MINING (extraction and processing projects).
faq.ctaTitle: Does your project require heavy industrial equipment?
faq.ctaDescription: If your company needs industrial cranes, oversized cargo transport or specialized lifting services, we are ready to serve you.
